column1: Dont live in Iowa? Do your civic duty: Share this with someone who does. "The Iowa caucus is just days away: February 1 2016
And if youve never caucused before—or you know someone whos attending his or her first caucus—weve got you covered." Caucusing is easy important and yes even fun
Just take a look at this three-step guide and share it with a friend
Mark your calendar for February 1 and well see you there!
